AI_WALL_LOOPING.reasoning: No evidence of customer being stuck in an AI loop. All customer interactions were with human support agents, and AI only performed backend automation tasks.

IGNORING_CONTEXT.reasoning: Support agent Randall Shawver stated customer had downgraded to 7.5.7, but customer explicitly denied this and corrected the misunderstanding, indicating the agent didn't properly check the actual status.

PREMATURE_CLOSURE.reasoning: While the ticket status shows closed, the final interaction indicates engineering provided a test build to the customer, suggesting the ticket reached a resolution attempt rather than premature closure.

P1_SEV1_MISHANDLING.reasoning: This urgent priority ticket shows signs of mishandling - customer expressed extreme frustration about patience running out and loss of trust, development team was slow to respond, and there were extended delays despite the critical nature of the issue.
